document.full_text: "ghost brothers of darkland county," a long-in-the-works musical by the horror writer stephen king and the rock musician john mellencamp, will have its world premiere in april 2012.
document.title: john mellencamp-stephen king stage collaboration gets an opening date
lines_and_colors: "ghost brothers of darkland county," a long-in-the-works musical by the horror writer stephen king and the rock musician john mellencamp, will have its world premiere in april 2012.
